text: Tokkel qaziiz barra usun teetit aban camii kee assacokki toobbe waqdi is isi gufneh ken seecak farmo keenih rubte, elle gacan arac kee elle keltan makaddiidiiy, garuq faxxa maaqo keenih massosseeh kulli tiyah gile keenik tecee maaqo edde yargiqeeninkeh, tohuk lakal Yuusufow: keenil eweq itteeh, usuk keenil yewqeeh usun kaa yublen waqdi kaa yessekexxeenih, kay qaxmaqaane ken hirigteeh gaboobi sinnik yirgiqen, garuq faxxa maaqo yargiqeenim akkaluk warig√¢ gibdah, usun qajjibsitak: caysa Yalli saytunih tah seehadaytu hinna, ta seehadayti kalah tuhinna Yallih garil muxxo le malaykattu akke waytek iyyen
